section.title: Applicable scenarios
section.p: In high-definition or ultra-high-definition video scenarios, you can first call this method to query the device's score. If the returned score is low (for example, below 60), you need to lower the video resolution to avoid affecting the video experience. The minimum device score required for different business scenarios is varied. For specific score recommendations, please .

When the method call succeeds, it returns a value in the range of [0,100], indicating the current device's score. The larger the value, the stronger the device capability. Most devices are rated between 60 and 100. When the method call fails, the exception is thrown; and you need to catch the exception and handle it accordingly.
